definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: Lo: A king-sized bed sounds great.
I stayed in the largest of the 3 -suite with king bed.
sentences.chinese: 我入住的是其中最大的一个套间带有特大号床。

sentences.english: Please super-size my meal, I am ver hungry.
sentences.chinese: 给我来一份特大号的快餐，我很饿。

sentences.english: Dress sizes range from petite to extra large.
sentences.chinese: 服装尺码从特小号到特大号不等。

sentences.english: And “outsize fiscal deficits” suggest that fiscal stimulus may also be exhausted.
sentences.chinese: “特大号财政赤字”也暗示财政刺激可能也气数将近。

sentences.english: I'm expecting one of those crimes, something big, to fall into my lap.
sentences.chinese: 我在等待案件，说不定那特大号的案子会落在我手上。

sentences.english: A shaggy, oversize stuffed toy dog lay in front of the television set.
sentences.chinese: 一个毛茸茸的特大号玩具狗摆放在了电视机前。

sentences.english: These suites have one king-size bed and ample closet space.
sentences.chinese: 这些套房有一个特大号床和充足的储藏空间。

sentences.english: I like to have an extra large green skirt.
sentences.chinese: 我盘算购件特大号的绿裙子。

sentences.english: Has such a Outsize fool , Cherishes you devotedly , Hooting.
sentences.chinese: 有这么一个特大号笨蛋，小心翼翼地爱护著妳，栩婷。

sentences.english: Yes, I think so. Do you have it in extra large?
sentences.chinese: 是的，我想是这样。你们有特大号的吗？

sentences.english: You can supersize your meal for only 39 cents extra.
sentences.chinese: 另加39美分您可以换成特大号的套餐。

sentences.english: You can have a room with either a queen- or a king-size bed.
sentences.chinese: 你可以有一个房间，内有一张大号或特大号床。

sentences.english: And everything in the store was just this enormous size.
sentences.chinese: 这里所有的东西都是特大号。

sentences.english: I'd like to order an extra large chicken and mushroom pizza with extra toppings.
sentences.chinese: 我想要点一个特大号鸡肉磨菇披萨，配料加量。

sentences.english: I want to buy a new bed, but this time a king size one.
sentences.chinese: 我想买张新床，但这次要买张特大号的。
